item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 dev 1
item.description: The first snapshot after releasing 4.3, already packed with new features!
item.dc:creator: Clay John

item.title: Godot 4.3, a shared effort
item.description: With over 3,500 commits authored by over 500 contributors, the latest Godot Engine release comes packed full of new features and improvements.
item.dc:creator: Godot contributors

item.title: Design of the Skeleton Modifier 3D
item.description: We have reworked the skeleton bone update process to add SkeletonModifier3D for modifying the Skeleton.
item.dc:creator: Silc Renew

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.3 RC 3
item.description: With all known major regressions fixed, we are now publishing a third release candidate to confirm that 4.3 is ready to go stable.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Gamescom here we come!
item.description: We are once again attending gamescom, and organizing two meet-up opportunities this time.
item.dc:creator: Nat

item.title: Introducing the improved ufbx importer in Godot 4.3
item.description: Godot 4.3 now includes native .fbx support
item.dc:creator: Lyuma

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.3 RC 2
item.description: After a week in the Release Candidate stage, we have squashed most bugs we were still tracking for 4.3, and are ready for a second candidate.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.3 RC 1
item.description: We are cautiously optimistic that Godot 4.3 is ready for release, please test it and let us know if we are right!
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.3 beta 3
item.description: We are nearing the end of the beta phase for Godot 4.3, which is shaping up to be a very solid release, solving a lot of pain points.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: New Dev Fund Perks: Discord Role and Forum Badge
item.description: Proudly display your support on our community platforms.
item.dc:creator: Winston Yallow

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 3.6 RC 1
item.description: We are now at the Release Candidate stage, finalizing everything so that we can release 3.6-stable for all users.
item.dc:creator: lawnjelly

item.title: Godot Community Poll 2024
item.description: We want to learn more about the Godot community, understand who the users of the engine are, and find out how we can better support you.
item.dc:creator: Emi

item.title: Godot returns: gamescom latam
item.description: Godot will be present at gamescom latam once again: meet contributors and fellow gamedevs at the booth, or sign up to our very own party!
item.dc:creator: George Marques

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.3 beta 2
item.description: Godot 4.3 is in beta, and progressing well towards stable. This beta 2 fixes many critical issues reported by testers of the previous snapshots.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: GodotCon 24 - Submit ideas! Get tickets!
item.description: GodotCon 24 will take place on the 12+13th of October in Berlin, Germany. The first batch of tickets as well as the call for speakers and exhibitors just went live. Sponsors welcome.
item.dc:creator: Nat

item.title: Migrating Animations from Godot 4.0 to 4.3
item.description: In Godot 4.3, a large number of animation features have been reworked since 4.0, so it's time to migrate your animations.
item.dc:creator: Silc Renew

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.3 beta 1
item.description: Godot 4.3 is ready for broad testing as we finalize the release.
item.dc:creator: Godot contributors

item.title: Web Export in 4.3
item.description: With single-threaded builds and sample playback, it's now easier than ever to export your game to the Web with Godot 4.3. And more!
item.dc:creator: Adam Scott

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 3.6 beta 5
item.description: This beta represents feature freeze for 3.6. We will now concentrate on bug fixing until we reach stable.
item.dc:creator: lawnjelly

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.3 dev 6
item.description: The last dev snapshot for 4.3 before feature freeze is a big one after 6 weeks of work!
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Introducing Reverse Z (AKA I'm sorry for breaking your shader)
item.description: We are breaking compatibility for some custom shaders. Here is why.
item.dc:creator: Clay John

item.title: Update on the Collaboration with Google and The Forge
item.description: The collaboration with Google and The Forge has concluded successfully!
item.dc:creator: Clay John

item.title: Maintenance release: Godot 4.2.2 & 4.1.4
item.description: It's been a while since our last update for the 4.2 and 4.1 branches, but the wait should be worth it!
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Release candidates: Godot 4.1.4 RC 3 & 4.2.2 RC 3
item.description: Last round of release candidates for the upcoming maintenance releases.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde
